Class DcmaTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert

        • com.ephesoft.dcma.test.DcmaTestBase
          • com.ephesoft.dcma.test.DcmaTestCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBarcodeExtractionTests, AbstractBarcodeTests, AbstractCleanupTest, AbstractDataAccessTests, AbstractDATests, AbstractExportTest, AbstractFolderImporterTest, AbstractHeartBeatTest, AbstractImageMagickTests, AbstractKVExtractionTest, AbstractOcrTests, AbstractRegExTest, AbstractRegexTests, AbstractRegexValidationTest, AbstractSearchClassificationTests, AbstractTableExtractionTest, AbstractTesseractTests

    @ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:applicationContext-test.xml")
@TransactionConfiguration(transactionManager="transactionManager",
                          defaultRollback=true)
@TestExecutionListeners(value=org.springframework.test.context.transaction.TransactionalTestExecutionListener.class)
@Transactional
public abstract class DcmaTestCase
extends DcmaTestBase
    Base class for unit tests involving the database.
